text:
1. Page Title: Dostoevsky's Struggles

2. Panels:

   - Panel 1 — Setup: Dostoevsky at his desk, overwhelmed.
     Dialogue/Thoughts:
       • Dostoevsky: "So much debt, so little time..."
       • Dostoevsky: "I must write faster, for them."

   
   - Panel 2 — Setup: A crowd at Pushkin's monument, cheering.
     Dialogue/Thoughts:
       • Crowd: "Dostoevsky, our voice!"
       • Dostoevsky: "This love... it warms my heart."

3. Layout: staggered

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Dostoevsky faced personal tragedies and poverty throughout his life, yet his profound insights and literary contributions earned him enduring admiration in Russia.
